results.p: 4 days ago — CHARACTER meaning: 1. the particular combination of qualities in someone or something that makes them or it different…. Learn more.
type, kind, sort, nature, description, character mean a number of individuals thought of as a group because of a common quality or qualities.
A character or personage, [1] is a person or other being in a narrative (such as a novel, play, radio or television series, music, film, or video game).
A character is a unit of information that roughly corresponds to a grapheme, grapheme-like unit, or symbol, such as in an alphabet or syllabary
A character is a person, animal, being, creature, or thing in a story. Writers use characters to perform the actions and speak dialogue, moving the story along ...

results.t: Character in Literature | Definition, Types & Examples
results.p: A literary character is a person, animal, or object/thing that is presented as a person, in a narrative or dramatic piece of work.

results.p: 20 meanings: 1. the combination of traits and qualities distinguishing the individual nature of a person or thing 2. one such.

noun a characteristic property that defines the apparent individual nature of something “the radical character of our demands”
